dashboard.title: Prior Authorization Operations Dashboard
dashboard.description: Real-time monitoring of PA processing efficiency and costs

metrics.name: Automation Rate
metrics.query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN submission_method IN ('API', 'AI_AUTOMATED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::FLOAT / COUNT(*) * 100 FROM prior_authorizations WHERE {filters}

charts.name: PA Volume by Submission Method
charts.query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', created_date) as date, submission_method, COUNT(*) as volume FROM prior_authorizations WHERE {filters} GROUP BY 1, 2

charts.name: Cost per PA Trend
charts.query: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('week', created_date) as week, submission_method, AVG(processing_cost) as avg_cost FROM pa_cost_metrics WHERE {filters} GROUP BY 1, 2

charts.name: Approval Rates by Service
charts.query: SELECT service_category, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'APPROVED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::FLOAT / COUNT(*) * 100 as approval_rate FROM prior_authorizations WHERE {filters} GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC

charts.name: Processing Time Distribution
charts.query: SELECT processing_hours FROM prior_authorizations WHERE {filters} AND processing_hours < 100

tables.name: Top Denial Reasons
tables.query: SELECT denial_reason, COUNT(*) as count, AVG(appeal_flag) * 100 as appeal_rate, AVG(CASE WHEN appeal_flag = 1 THEN appeal_overturned ELSE NULL END) * 100 as overturn_rate FROM prior_authorizations WHERE status = 'DENIED' AND {filters} GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10

tables.name: Provider Performance Summary
tables.query: SELECT p.provider_name, COUNT(*) as volume, AVG(CASE WHEN pa.status = 'APPROVED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100 as approval_rate, AVG(pa.processing_hours) as avg_time, p.gold_card_status FROM prior_authorizations pa JOIN providers p ON pa.provider_id = p.provider_id WHERE {filters} GROUP BY 1, 5 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 20

alerts.name: High Manual Volume
alerts.message: Manual PA processing exceeds 70% - automation opportunity

alerts.name: Cost Spike
alerts.message: Average PA cost exceeds $12 - investigate processing inefficiencies

alerts.name: Processing Delays
alerts.message: Average processing time exceeds 24 hours - SLA at risk
